hints.content: On the number line, we start at $585$ and move **left** $\purpleC{300}$, then $\blueD{60}$, and finally $\greenD{8}$ more.

options.alt: A number line that has, moving left to right, tick marks labeled 217, 225, 285, and 585. A purple arrow labeled minus 300 is above the number line beginning at 585 and ending at 285. A blue arrow labeled minus 60 is above the number line beginning at 285 and ending at 225. A green arrow labeled minus 8 is above the number line beginning at 225 and ending at 217. !

A green arrow labeled minus 8 is above the number line beginning at 225 and ending at 217.](web+graphie://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-perseus-graphie/1227713287a93e0a0aeb7b8e49bbc7a799152987)

A green arrow labeled minus 6 is above the number line beginning at 205 and ending at 199.](web+graphie://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-perseus-graphie/8b57a1f580b6e2f1545a740837777aa46bdca8a2)
